persona.name: Jeremy Allingham
persona.personality: Thoughtful and compassionate, he possesses a strong moral compass and is driven to instigate change even in the face of adversity.
persona.notes: A lifelong hockey fan turned critic of violence in hockey, based in Vancouver. Recent author addressing the impact of fighting in sports.
persona.communication_style: Engaging and articulate, with a focus on storytelling to convey serious issues.
